00050 ParametersDelegate::ParametersDelegate(  QObject* parent)
00051  : QItemDelegate(parent)
00052 {
00053

00061 QWidget* ParametersDelegate::createEditor(QWidget *parent, const QStyleOptionViewItem& /*option*/, const QModelIndex &index) const
00062 {
00063         const ParametersModel* model = static_cast< const ParametersModel* >( index.model() );
00064         SoField* field = model->ModelItem( index )->GetField();
00065         
00066         if( field->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoSFEnum::getClassTypeId() ) )
00067         {
00068                 QComboBox* editor = new QComboBox( parent );
00069                 SoSFEnum* enumField = static_cast< SoSFEnum* >( field );
00070                 for( int i = 0; i < enumField->getNumEnums() ; ++i )
00071                 {
00072                         SbName enumName;
00073                         enumField->getEnum( i , enumName );
00074                         editor->addItem( enumName.getString() );
00075                 }
00076                 return editor;
00077         }
00078         else
00079         {
00080                 QLineEdit* editor = new QLineEdit(parent);
00081                 return editor;
00082         }
00083 }
00084 
00085 void ParametersDelegate::setEditorData(QWidget *editor,
00086                                      const QModelIndex &index) const
00087 {
00088         const ParametersModel* model = static_cast< const ParametersModel* >( index.model() );
00089         SoField* field = model->ModelItem( index )->GetField();
00090         
00091         if( field->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoSFEnum::getClassTypeId() ) )
00092         {
00093 ;
00094                 SoSFEnum* enumField = static_cast< SoSFEnum* >( field );
00095                 int selectedIndex = enumField->getValue();
00096                 
00097                 QComboBox* combo = static_cast<QComboBox *>(editor);
00098                 combo->setCurrentIndex( selectedIndex );
00099 
00100         }
00101         else
00102         {
00103                 QString value = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00104                         
00105                 QLineEdit  *textEdit = static_cast<QLineEdit *>(editor);
00106                 textEdit->setText(value);
00107         }
00108 
00109         
00110 }
